folder: Atlantic Avenue & Montauk Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
(1)
Atlantic Ave., looking east from, but not including Montauk Ave. The view shows the tracks of the Long Island Railroad. On the right, is shown part of No. 3276 Atlantic Ave., a frame house.
July 27, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, from Berrian Street. The tracks are not clearly seen in this view.
July 27, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

(3)
The same, from Berrian Street, showing the tracks more clearly.
July 27, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
